trans-unit.source: Launch a Manual Backup on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: Launch a Manual Backup on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Lancer une sauvegarde manuelle sur l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: You can launch a manual backup on your <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, using the File Explorer. A manual backup can be launched:

seg-source.mrk: You can launch a manual backup on your <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, using the File Explorer.
A manual backup can be launched:

target.mrk: Vous pouvez lancer une sauvegarde manuelle sur votre <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, à l'aide de l'Explorateur de fichiers.
Une sauvegarde manuelle peut être lancée :

trans-unit.source: On a file or a folder saved on your workstation.

seg-source.mrk: On a file or a folder saved on your workstation.

target.mrk: Sur un fichier ou un dossier enregistré sur votre poste de travail.

trans-unit.source: As a session separate from a backup session scheduled by an administrator, which means you can perform a manual backup at any time. The manual backup is added to the list of backups performed on your agent.

seg-source.mrk: As a session separate from a backup session scheduled by an administrator, which means you can perform a manual backup at any time.
The manual backup is added to the list of backups performed on your agent.

target.mrk: En tant que session séparée d'une session de sauvegarde planifiée par un administrateur, ce qui signifie que vous pouvez effectuer une sauvegarde manuelle à tout moment.
La sauvegarde manuelle est ajoutée à la liste des sauvegardes effectuées sur votre agent.

trans-unit.source: To launch a manual backup on a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: To launch a manual backup on a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Pour lancer une sauvegarde manuelle sur un <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: In the File Explorer, right-click on the folder or file that you want to back up.

seg-source.mrk: In the File Explorer, right-click on the folder or file that you want to back up.

target.mrk: Dans l'Explorateur de fichiers, faire un clic droit sur le dossier ou le fichier que vous souhaitez sauvegarder.

trans-unit.source: Windows and Linux: Select Backup > Backup now.

seg-source.mrk: Windows and Linux: Select Backup > Backup now.

target.mrk: Windows et Linux: sélectionnez Sauvegarde > Sauvegarder maintenant.

trans-unit.source: MacOS: In the menu, select Backup now.

seg-source.mrk: MacOS: In the menu, select Backup now.

target.mrk: MacOS;: Dans le menu, sélectionnez Sauvegarder maintenant.

trans-unit.source: A window containing the backup status as well as the location of the item backed up displays.

seg-source.mrk: A window containing the backup status as well as the location of the item backed up displays.

target.mrk: Une fenêtre contenant l'état de sauvegarde ainsi que l'emplacement de l'élément sauvegardé s'affiche.

trans-unit.source: Click OK or close the window.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK or close the window.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur OK ou fermez la fenêtre.

trans-unit.source: For more details on how to restore a file or a folder, see <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Files_Browse_Mode.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Files in Browse Mode</MadCap:xref> or <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Folders.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Folders</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: For more details on how to restore a file or a folder, see <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Files_Browse_Mode.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Files in Browse Mode</MadCap:xref> or <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Folders.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Folders</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Pour plus de détails sur la façon de restaurer un fichier ou un dossier, voir <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Files_Browse_Mode.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Files in Browse Mode</MadCap:xref> ou <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Folders.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Folders</MadCap:xref>.
